code:
gantt
    title Software Development Project
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    excludes weekends
    
    section Planning
    Requirements gathering    :done, req, 2024-01-01, 2024-01-15
    Architecture design        :done, arch, 2024-01-16, 2024-01-30
    
    section Development
    Backend API development    :active, api, 2024-02-01, 30d
    Frontend development       :crit, ui, 2024-02-15, 25d
    Database setup            :done, db, 2024-02-01, 10d
    
    section Testing
    Unit testing              :test, after api, 15d
    Integration testing       :crit, after test, 10d
    UAT                      :uat, after test, 12d
    
    section Deployment
    Staging deployment        :milestone, stage, after test, 0d
    Production deployment     :milestone, prod, after uat, 0d

%%accTitle Software Development Project Timeline
%%accDescr A Gantt chart showing the timeline and phases of a software development project, from requirements gathering through deployment.
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 主架构 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 '主架构'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
